name: Sleepless (Dreamless_Ghost, rollingTR, TheLegend666, b-ang)
description:
Sleepless is a first-person puzzlegame with elements of the Thriller
genre. The game contains collectable items and captivating puzzles. The
gameplay and atmosphere is inspired by "The Room" and "What Remains of Edith Finch". ❄️ Try to escape but remember you are not alone. ❄️

During a violent snowstorm in a small town in America, the protagonist awakes in a panic. He quickly realizes that he seems to be locked in inside his bedroom. He is all alone and cannot rely on outside help to aid him. As he tries to escape from his own bedroom he gets a text message on his phone - he's not alone.

Features

  • Escape room experience with a pronounced thriller atmosphere.
  • The background story is gradually revealed through collectible objects.
  •  Exciting, unique and varying puzzles
  • Gloomy and exciting atmosphere

Disclaimer

This Game is an early release, changes are planned until Sunday March 20th 2022.

Install instructions

Extract the .rar with 7-Zip or WinRAR and start the .exe inside the extracted folder. The game is only available for Windows platforms.

Controls

W,A,S,D - Walk

I - Inventory

P - Phone

Strg - Crouch

Shift - Sprint

Esc- Pause

The Team behind Sleepless

The game was created by Merging Lines, a group of students from the SRH Hochschule Heidelberg. This is the exam for the end of the third semester.
